settings.text1:
Allspice oil is a potent antioxidant due to the presence of tannins, quercetin, eugenol, and other organic compounds. The antioxidant quality is very effective in countering early signs of aging. The oil slows aging by neutralizing free oxidants or radicals.

Products which contain this ingredient: PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text2:
Sweet almond oil is beneficial in skincare because it is rich in vitamins E and A, which help protect the skin from UV radiation and oxidative stress, keeping it soft and supple. Its emollient properties improve skin tone and complexion by moisturizing and preventing dryness without clogging pores.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK, MANDARIN MELT CLEANSING BALM
settings.text3:
Aloe vera is used in traditional medicine as a skin treatment. Aloe vera is a popular medicinal plant that is used in the cosmetic, pharmaceutical and food industries. Its leaves are full of a gel-like substance that are said to contain numerous beneficial compounds such as powerful antioxidant compounds. Some of these compounds can help inhibit the growth of harmful bacteria.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST, BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK, BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL, CITRUS CUCUMBER TONER, CLARIFYING SERUM, DEEP ENZYME CLEANSE, MARINE PEARL CREAM, PLUMPING SERUM, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text4:
Non-abrasive exfoliants, AHAs are a group of organic carboxylic compounds similar to those found in food products including glycolic acid (found in sugar cane), lactic acid (found in sour milk), malic acid (found in apples), citric acid (found in citrus fruits) and tartaric acid (found in grape wine). It is said they aid in the reduction of wrinkles, that soften the look of strong, defining lines.

Products which contain this ingredient: DEEP ENZYME CLEANSE, MOISTURIZING WASH, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text5:
ALA is found naturally in the mitochondria portion of our cells, as part of an enzyme system that helps energy production. It’s both fat and water-soluble, meaning it’s easily absorbed through the lipid layers of your skin and works well as a free-radical fighter. By applying ALA topically to the skin, it can help increase cellular metabolism which is vital for skin cell repair. Menopause is often accompanied by skin that is thin and wrinkled. Estrogen gets depleted as aging accelerates. But studies show that antioxidants like ALAs help prevent this deficiency in older women. ALA helps regulate the production of nitric oxide, which controls blood flow to the skin. This is the secret to eliminating the appearance of dark circles and the reason ALA can help transform the complexion from dull, pasty, and pale to vibrant and glowing.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text6:
Often referred to as the building blocks of proteins and peptides, they have a specific role in skin care. Naturally appearing in skin, as part of our natural moisturizing factors (NMFs), amino acids maintain skin’s hydration, texture, resilience, and an overall supple, healthy appearance. Within skin’s uppermost layers, they allow our skin to thrive and to stay hydrated. Because they work in harmony with aquaporins (the body’s water transport system), when applied via skin care products amino acids help maintain skin’s smoothness and hydration. Some amino acids are believed to help skin create more of its own antioxidants, such as glutathione. Topically applied amino acids help strengthen skin’s natural defense system, making it less likely to show signs of aging from environmental damage.

Products which contain this ingredient: DEEP ENZYME CLEANSE
settings.text7:
The Vitamin C and antioxidants present in amla helps brighten the skin. It helps fade hyperpigmentation and dark spots, and generally evens out your complexion. Amla helps increase cell turnover, which promotes brighter and healthier skin. All the nutrients present in amla are natural anti-ageing fighters. Whether it’s vitamin, amino acids, or even the antioxidants present, all boost the production of collagen in the skin. This reduces the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and discolouration, and leaves you with plumper, younger-looking skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM
settings.text8:
Apple extract is a superfruit packed with antioxidants, making it an extremely powerful anti-aging ingredient that effectively fights the signs of aging, smooths skin and evens skin texture and tone. Apple extract is not only natural, but also has been shown to increase skin hydration by 88%.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK
settings.text9:
Apricot oil nourishes the skin to decrease the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, improves skin tone, and increases skin radiance. It also has antiseptic, antibacterial, and antioxidant effects, which can help to heal blemishes and protect against environmental damages.

Products which contain this ingredient: HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL
settings.text10:
Argan oil is rich in antioxidants that help protect against environmental damage, like polyphenols and vitamin E. This vitamin is well loved in skincare for its anti-aging and skin softening properties. Argan oil also provides healing and sealing to the skin's outer layer, which doesn't just improve appearance—it also prevents further drying and damage.

Products which contain this ingredient: NOURISHING OIL
settings.text11:
Blue Spriulina can boost the overall health and radiant appearance of your skin, as well as preventing acne buildup and swelling. Rich in nutrients, vitamins and both fatty and amino acids, Spirulina decreases inflammation, tones the skin and encourages cell turnover to promote a more youthful-looking complexion.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST
settings.text12:
Asafoetida is an amazing ingredient to promote skin health and glow. The powerful anti-inflammatory properties work well to lessen acne production and its anti-bacterial properties hinder the growth of pimples and rashes. It improves the blood flow to the facial tissue enhancing the skin radiance and glow.

Products which contain this ingredient: MARINE PEARL CREAM, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text13:
See: Vitamin C

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST, BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL
settings.text14:
Ascorbyl glucoside is one of the top ingredients, meant to help both brighten and fade dark spots, while peptides promise to minimize the look of fine lines and wrinkles. It's a potent serum that visibly improves major signs of aging.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST
settings.text15:
Ashwagandha is a powerful adaptogen with anti-inflammatory properties, making it beneficial on irritated skin. It contains collagen, as well as natural oils that make your skin supple and smooth. Ashwagandha reduces melanin production, and protects the skin from hyperpigmentation. Use ashwagandha to get rid of dry skin. It moisturizes the skin and makes it smooth.

Products which contain this ingredient: RADIANT DETOX MINERAL MASK
settings.text16:
Aspen bark is valued in skincare for its natural preservative qualities due to salicylates, which prevent microbial growth and extend product shelf life. These salicylates also provide anti-inflammatory benefits, soothing skin irritation and reducing redness in conditions like eczema and rosacea. Aspen bark's gentle exfoliating properties, similar to those of salicylic acid, help promote cell turnover for smoother, brighter skin. Additionally, its rich antioxidant content protects against environmental stressors, minimizing signs of aging and improving overall skin texture.

Products which contain this ingredient: CLARIFYING SERUM
settings.text17:
Astragalus helps to promote skin health in several ways: it is a powerful antioxidant, which means it fights free radicals in the body and helps prevent the signs of aging. Astragalus helps to strengthen and support lung health, which can help to improve circulation and oxygen delivery to the skin. It helps to remove toxins, protect collagen in the skin, and much more.

Products which contain this ingredient: RADIANT DETOX MINERAL MASK
settings.text18:
Avocado oil is packed with Vitamin E, Potassium, Lecithin, and other nourishing ingredients that moisturize and smooth the skin. The oil's anti-inflammatory properties can help reduce inflammation often associated with acne. Additionally, it hydrates oily skin without aggravating the problem or clogging pores, making it suitable for acne-prone skin. Essential fatty acids and oleic acid in avocado oil promote collagen development, which may aid in scar healing.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK

settings.text1:
Bakuchiol is an extract from the seeds of Psoralea corylifolia (nicknamed "babchi"), a plant grown in India that's been a staple of traditional Ayurvedic medicine for many years. Similar to retinoids, bakuchiol appears to stimulate collagen producing receptors in the skin. By stimulating skin cell turnover, Bakuchiol helps smooth fine lines and wrinkles, and improves skin tone and texture. It is also an antioxidant, meaning it can provide some UV protection from free-radical damage.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM
settings.text2:
Bamboo powder is a great source of hydration for the skin. It helps to lock in moisture and keep the skin feeling plump and hydrated. Its exfoliating benefits aids in collagen production, which is important for the skin's elasticity. Alongside anti-inflammatory properties & antibacterial properties, bamboo extract also helps fight acne. It strengthens the skin's barrier and keeps impurities and bacteria out. But, it isn't so intense that it'll irritate sensitive skin. Bamboo powder can help to protect the skin from damage caused by UV rays.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAMBOO REFINING POLISH
settings.text3:
Baobab is a cold pressed seed oil from a west african tree, rich antioxidants and polyphenols help lock in moisture for your skin without leaving it greasy. Baobab oil is a fantastic plant oil that penetrates the skin's layer and helps care for mature, dry skin, fighting the look of fine lines and wrinkles.

Products which contain this ingredient: NOURISHING OIL
settings.text4:
Honeybees produce a natural wax, secreting it from glands on the sides of their bodies. Beeswax protects, softens and helps hydrate and rejuvenate your skin. When applied to the skin, beeswax forms a protective barrier that helps protect it from environmental stressors, while also holding in moisture and reducing dryness. Unlike ingredients made from petroleum, beeswax doesn’t “suffocate” the skin, and won’t clog pores. It acts as a natural emollient and humectant, attracting moisture to the skin and sealing it in keeping your skin hydrated over time. Packed with Vitamin A, it can be effective in hydrating dry skin and can rejuvenate the look of your skin!

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL
settings.text5:
Beetroot powder is rich in vitamins and nutrients to brighten dull skin. It fights free radicals, aids in lessening the look of hyperpigmentation and protects the skin from early signs of aging.

Products which contain this ingredient: RADIANT DETOX MINERAL MASK
settings.text6:
Bentonite Clay is a mineral-rich, detoxifying and antibacterial clay that helps absorb toxins, & improves blood circulation. Bentonite Clay helps aging skin by detoxifying, gently exfoliating, and increasing circulation, which reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK, and our RADIANT DETOX MINERAL MASK
settings.text7:
Benzyl alcohol is used in skincare as a preservative to prevent microbial growth and as a solvent to ensure stability and uniformity in products, which helps to enhance product efficacy.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAMBOO REFINING POLISH

Bergamot oil is extracted from the rinds of citrus fruit (Citrus bergamia) that grow on bergamot orange trees and is used as a skin softener. Several compounds in bergamot oil have antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties. This may make bergamot oil an effective spot treatment for acne in people who do not have sensitive skin. Its analgesic qualities may also make it effective against painful cysts and pimples.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST, DEEP ENZYME CLEANSE, NOURISHING OIL, PLUMPING SERUM
settings.text9:
Beta-Carotene acts as a potent antioxidant in skincare, protecting the skin from oxidative stress, enhancing its natural glow, and promoting a healthier, more youthful appearance.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM
settings.text10:
Bilberry is a close relative of Blueberries (and is also known as a Huckleberry) and has been used in the USA since the 1600's. It is known to strengthen skin against the signs of redness. Rich in tannins, Bilberry can also boost skin's environmental defenses in the presence of UVA light.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK

Bitter Orange Oil’s most important benefit is its deeply purifying effect on the skin. It cleanses and refreshes your complexion, delivering powerful antiseptic, antifungal, and antibacterial properties that help keep skin looking healthy and clear.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST
settings.text12:
Brown seaweed, which is also known as Fucus Vesiculosus or bladderwrack, is rich in vitamins, minerals and trace elements and has powerful moisturizing properties. It also serves as a preventive ingredient to help minimize the appearance of visible signs of aging. It nourishes dehydrated and mature skin, leaving it visibly plumper and more youthful-looking.

Products which contain this ingredient: PLUMPING SERUM

Blue Tansy is part of the chamomile family (and also known as Moroccan chamomile). The magnificent blue color and soothing effects come from chamazulene, a compound that has antioxidant properties. It has the ability to fight signs of aging such as wrinkles and fine lines. At the same time is it wonderfully moisturizing and its essence is light and sweet, herby and minty.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST
settings.text14:
Blueberry extract is a source of pro-retinol which helps to reduce the appearance of signs of aging. Blueberry extract hydrates and plumps the skin, making it look youthful and radiant. The high vitamin C and vitamin E content in blueberries help fade the look of blemishes, sun spots, and dark spots. This evens out and brightens your complexion.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK
settings.text15:
Borage oil is made from the seeds of the Borage plant. They're high in linolenic acid, an omega-6 fatty acid that helps hydrate the skin and keep it supple, plump and radiant. Borage seed oils could help treat skin conditions like eczema, acne, rosacea, and seborrheic dermatitis.

Products which contain this ingredient: BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL
settings.text16:
Bromelain is a protein-digesting enzyme mixture derived from the stem, fruit, and juice of the pineapple plant. Rich in vitamins C & E, it can brighten and even out skin tone. It acts as an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) to remove dead skin cells via chemical exfoliation. People who experience acne may notice a visible difference in the clarity of their skin after using pineapple-based products.

Products which contain this ingredient: DEEP ENZYME CLEANSE, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text18:
Butterfly Pea Flower is a stunning deep purple/blue flower. which contains a high concentration of polyphenols and flavonoids, a potent antioxidant which can stimulate the natural production of collagen and elastin.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK

Its antioxidant properties also help to protect the skin from environmental stressors, supporting a healthy, radiant glow.

Caprylic triglyceride is a plant-based (from coconuts) emollient and is an excellent moisturizer for the skin. It can also help to reduce the look of redness and itching. Its a lightweight carrier oil that can enhance the absorption of other skincare ingredients.

Caprylic Acid helps smooth the look of skin and works as an antioxidant. It also binds other ingredients together, and can work as a preservative to make the active ingredients in skincare last longer. Caprylic triglyceride is valued as a more natural alternative to other synthetic chemicals found in topical skin products.

Caprylyl/capryl glucoside is a mild cleanser used in cosmetics made from vegetable-derived fatty acids and sugar-derived formulations and can be sensitive skin-friendly. It can increase the foaming capacities of the product. It acts as an emulsifier that allows mixing of water and essential oils. It can blend dense oils like carrier oils in your product.

Carrot oil contains healthy doses of both vitamin A and beta-carotene, which can encourage skin's natural exfoliation. It also help to prevent the look of dark spots and blemishes.

Castile soap is a vegetable-based soap. It was made originally in the Mediterranean area from the Castile region of Spain and was made of olive oil. Now, it is also made with a wide variety of oils, including coconut, castor, avocado, walnut, almond and even hemp oils. These oils give the soap its lathering, moisturizing, and cleansing properties.

Ceramides are essential in skincare as they strengthen the skin's natural barrier, helping to retain moisture and protect against environmental irritants and pollutants. They also improve skin texture and elasticity, reducing the appearance of fine lines and promoting a smoother, more youthful complexion.

Cetearyl alcohol is very different from “regular” alcohols. It's a white creamy mixture of plant-based oils to moisturize and soften the skin by locking moisture into the skin. It also helps skin care formulas maintain their texture, consistency, and thickness. It acts as a binding agent, helping to keep oil and water together.

CoQ10 (Coenzyme Q10) is beneficial for the skin's appearance because it is a powerful antioxidant that helps to neutralize harmful free radicals, one of the main causes of aging. This action helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and it supports increased elasticity and firmness, giving the skin a more youthful and radiant look.

Comfrey root is beneficial for the skin because it contains allantoin, which can promote the growth of new skin cells, and can improve the overall appearance of the skin. Additionally, its soothing properties help reduce the look of redness and irritation, making the skin look smoother and more even.

DMAE is short for dimethylaminoethanol and is naturally produced in the body. It is also found in fatty fish, such as salmon and is known to penetrate easily and tighten the look of skin. It has been called "A facelift in a jar" by many skincare ads. It enhances the effects of antioxidants like A, E, C and ALA. DMAE is one of the body's best defenses against natural free radical damage as we age and helps defend against signs of aging like skin sagging.

Propylene glycol is widely used in skincare as a humectant, which means it helps retain moisture in the skin by drawing water from the deeper layers and the environment into the top layer of the skin. This action helps keep the skin hydrated, soft, and looking smooth. Additionally, propylene glycol enhances the absorption of other ingredients into the skin, making it an effective carrier and improving the effectiveness of the skincare product.

Emulsifying Wax is beneficial in skincare as it helps blend oil and water components into a stable, smooth mixture, preventing the separation of these liquids in creams and lotions. This creates a consistent texture and ensures even distribution of ingredients, enhancing the moisturizing properties of the product and making it easier to apply and absorb into the skin for improved hydration and softness. Great for normal, combination, and oily skin types.

It helps improve the efficacy of traditional preservatives, ensuring products remain safe and stable for use, while also moisturizing and softening the skin by strengthening its natural barrier.

settings.text1:
Fennel is a rich source of Vitamin A, C, E and B-Complex, which helps stimulate Collagen which helps prevent lines, wrinkles and stretch marks. It is an excellent anti-inflammatory and leaves your skin with a healthy glow. Fennel is known to tone and firm skin, increase elasticity and smoothness, and stimulate blood circulation which helps in Anti-Cellulite formulation.

Products which contain this ingredient: MOISTURIZING WASH
settings.text2:
Ferulic Acid - is generally derived from cereal grains, but it can also be found to vegetables, fruits, seeds, and beans. This antioxidant enhances the stability and effectiveness of Vitamin C, making it work even harder and longer. It assists in skin cell regeneration to help slow down the aging process caused by oxidation.

Products which contain this ingredient: PLUMPING SERUM
settings.text3: See: Fennel
settings.text4:
Frankincense essential oil is a powerful astringent that helps protect skin cells. It can help reduce acne blemishes, mask the appearance of large pores, prevent wrinkles, and it even helps lift and tighten skin to naturally slow signs of aging.

Products which contain this ingredient: CLARIFYING SERUM, NOURISHING OIL, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK

Products which contain this ingredient: PLUMPING SERUM

settings.text1:
This phytochemical-rich oil has an abundance of flavonoids which have anti-inflammatory, anti-fungal benefits, and improves circulation of the skin. Phytochemicals are chemical compounds produced by plants. Geranium oil is said to effectively eliminate dead cells, tighten the skin, promote the regeneration of new skin, and diminish signs of aging.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, BAMBOO REFINING POLISH, CREAM
settings.text2:
Ginger Oil works to protect skin against free radicals and safeguards skin from premature ageing, improving elasticity and rejuvenating the complexion. As a powerful antiseptic and cleansing agent, Ginger Oil helps to detoxify the skin, and helps clear up acne.

Products which contain this ingredient: RADIANT DETOX MINERAL MASK
settings.text3:
Gluconolactone is a naturally occuring poly-hydroxy acid (PHA) which dissolves dead skin cells, improves the appearance of fine lines and discoloration, and can help remove excess oil from the skin. Gluconolactone is a humectant, which means it pulls moisture out of the air and absorbs it into the skin to help hydrate and soothe dry skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: CLARIFYING SERUM, HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL, MARINE PEARL CREAM, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text4:
Glucose oxidase is an enzyme that's naturally present in bee pollen and honey and works as a natural preservative. It mimics the body’s natural defense system.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM
settings.text5:
Vegetable glycerin, also known as glycerol or glycerin, is a clear liquid typically made from soybean, coconut or palm oils. It is odorless and has a mild, sweet taste with a syrup-like consistency. Glycerin soap is gentler on skin than most cleansers, making it a good choice for people who have particularly dry or sensitive skin. It also has a lower pH than other soaps, which helps the skin retain its natural moisture. Research shows that applying glycerin to your skin may gradually improve its smoothness and suppleness. In fact, using creams containing glycerin may increase skin hydration in as few as 10 days. In one study from the Asian Journal of Beauty & Cosmetology, a cream made from glycerin was more effective than those made from silicone oil or hyaluronic acid at hydrating skin and preventing loss of moisture.

Products which contain this ingredient: PLUMPING SERUM, DEEP ENZYME CLEANSE, MOISTURIZING WASH, BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL, BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, BAMBOO REFINING POLISH, BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST
settings.text6:
Glyceryl Caprylate is a co-emulsifier that is mainly used to stabilize O/W-emulsions (oil-in-water-emulsions) and is produced from is a single ester of glycerin and the coconut-derived fatty acid. It restores the oils of the skin, regulates the skin moisture and acts as a humidifier to the skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST
settings.text7:
Derived from sugar cane, Glycolic acid is the most popular alpha-hydroxy acid (AHA) used in skin care. Being the smallest AHA, it’s the most effective at getting into the skin. It’s a water-soluble acid that increases luminosity of the skin because it exfoliates the outermost dead layer, improving the reflection of light. It is said to be very effective at reducing fine lines, preventing acne, fading dark spots, increasing skin thickness, and evening out skin tone and texture.

Products which contain this ingredient: DEEP ENZYME CLEANSE
settings.text8:
Centella asiatica (often just called centella) is rich in amino acids, beta carotene, fatty acids, and numerous potent phytochemicals. Extracts have been found to calm inflammation, speed wound healing, stimulate new cell growth, build collagen, and improve circulation. Its fast-acting anti-inflammatory properties give you glowing and calm skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, PLUMPING SERUM
settings.title9:
Grapefruit Essential Oil, Grapefruit Peel Oil

Citrus Paradisi
settings.text9:
Grapefruit is extracted from glands located in the peel of the grapefruit and contains naturally occurring alpha hydroxy acids (AHAs) that help promote smoother, younger looking skin by increasing the rate of cell renewal. It can be useful for acne and oily skin because of its potent astringent, antibacterial and antimicrobial effects. It reinvigorates collagen production after it starts to decline and helps tone, firm and detoxify skin as well as increasing circulation. Its anti-inflammatory properties help it is said to soothe and treat redness from acne and rosacea. Test-tube studies show that it displayed antimicrobial properties against potentially harmful while exhibiting astringent and tightening properties that relieve congestion and limit excess sebum.

Products which contain this ingredient: PLUMPING SERUM, DEEP ENZYME CLEANSE, MOISTURIZING WASH
settings.text10:
Grapeseed Oil is a great source of vitamin E and provides antioxidants for your skin and is loaded with moisturizing omega-6 fatty acids. It helps tighten and tone the skin, protects against sun damage, and reduces the appearance of blemishes, wrinkles, and stretch marks. Used on skin, Grapeseed Oil cleanses the pores and balances oil production, thereby reducing future acne breakouts.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK, HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL, NOURISHING OIL
settings.text11:
Green Caviar commonly known as sea grapes.This vegan, fish roe-like appearance is where it gets its name. This seaweed is indigenous to Okinawa, Japan, and it's packed with nourishing ingredients amino acids and omega-3 that can help you achieve that coveted glass glowing skin. Its also rich in minerals and antioxidants to brighten complexion and streghthen skins elasticity.

Products which contain this ingredient: MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text12:
All of our products contain green tea. The polyphenols in green tea possess potent antioxidant and skin-soothing properties and shows significant promise for improving the appearance of sun-damaged skin. A potent anti-aging ingredient with its powerful antibacterial agent for treating acne and unclogging pores, it contains Vitamin B2 essential for collagen maintenance, firmness and Vitamin E, which supports new skin cell growth and also acts an intense hydrator for soft and nourished skin. Caffeine and tannins in green tea help shrink blood vessels around the eyes, minimizing puffiness and dark circles.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, PLUMPING SERUM, DEEP ENZYME CLEANSE, MOISTURIZING WASH, NOURISHING OIL, BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK, BAMBOO REFINING POLISH, CITRUS CUCUMBER TONER

settings.text2:
Horsetail contains important nutrients that support the health of the skin, including iron, manganese, silica and various antioxidants. It aids the production of collagen in the skin and is known to possess antimicrobial, antibacterial, and anti-inflammatory properties which is used in treating burns and wounds.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, PLUMPING SERUM
settings.title3:
Hyaluronic Acid

Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide
settings.text3:
Also known as “Senna”, Cassia is a plant-based form of Hyaluronic Acid. It moisturizes and softens skin, providing long-lasting hydration, and plumping fine lines and wrinkles. It also soothes skin by reducing inflammation and supports repair for healthy, supple skin. Hyaluronic acid protects skins barrier from harsh pollutants, keeps collagen synthesis up, which creates skin that is smoother, firmer and more youthful.

Products which contain this ingredient: PLUMPING SERUM
settings.title4: Hydroxyethyl Acrylate / Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer
settings.text4:
Hydroxyethyl acrylate is an emulsifier/stabilizer.

Products which contain this ingredient: BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL, BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK

settings.text1:
Iron oxides are minerals added to physical sunscreens to protect against visible light and UVA and UVB radiation and also give the formula its protective tint to correct any white cast. Zinc oxide has been shown to protect the skin from environmental stressors, like pollution, UV rays, and blue light emitted from screens. They act as a physical barrier on the skin, reflecting harmful rays and minimizing the amount of damage they cause. Iron oxides are non-comedogenic, meaning they won't clog pores or cause breakouts, making them a great choice for people with acne-prone skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: MINERAL TINT SPF 31, COLOR, SHIMMER

settings.text1:
Rich in flavonoids and saponins, honeysuckle can protect the skin against free radicals that lead to skin damage and signs of aging. Because honeysuckle is anti-bacterial, it can serve a natural preservative.

Products which contain this ingredient: MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text2:
The oil from this fruit is light, easily absorbs and deeply penetrates to soothe and soften while providing an excellent moisturizing effect and adding a healthy glow. It provides a long-acting layer of moisture that doesn’t evaporate quickly. The Vitamin E, B-complex, antioxidants and minerals in jojoba oil nourish and protect the skin. It is used to help treat acne, psoriasis, sunburn and dry, wrinkled and chapped skin. It has anti-inflammatory properties and helps reverse cell damage to skin. It removes bacteria and dirt, unblocks the sebum and dry skin build-up on our face. It's also used for razor burn! Jojoba oil can also accelerate the wound-healing process, as indicated in a study done at the Department of Environment and Life Sciences in Italy. The results showed that jojoba oil speeds up wound closures and stimulates collagen synthesis.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, PLUMPING SERUM, MARINE PEARL CREAM, NOURISHING OIL, BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST, MINERAL TINT SPF 31, HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL, COLOR, SHIMMER

settings.text1:
Kaolin clay smooths, exfoliates and detoxifies skin, absorbs excess oils and fights acne; it can strengthen and improve skin health and brighten your complexion. This clay is very gentle and mild and has a relatively low pH level—between 4 and 5—which is close to the skin’s natural pH of 5.5.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAMBOO REFINING POLISH, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK, RADIANT DETOX MINERAL MASK
settings.text2:
Pink clay contains a high iron mineral content, making it great for clarifying and brightening. One of the main benefits of pink clay is that it’s able to draw out impurities and absorb excess oil, or sebum, in the skin resulting in a refreshed look to the skin, including improved skin tone and texture.

Products which contain this ingredient: RADIANT DETOX MINERAL MASK
settings.text3:
Kojic acid is derived from mushrooms and also can be created during the sake brewing process from fermented rice. It has the ability to penetrate layers of skin to stop melanin productio to brighten skin and fade dark spots from sun damage and age spots, or scars.

Products which contain this ingredient: MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text4:
See: Glycerin

Products which contain this ingredient: MANDARIN MELT CLEANSING BALM, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK

settings.text1:
Lactic Acid is an alpha-hydroxy acid (AHA) which helps disinfectant and softens the keratin in skin improving its ability to hold moisture and softening it. It also helps to remove soap-scum, prevents limescale and is anti-bacterial.

Products which contain this ingredient: MOISTURIZING WASH, BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK
settings.text2:
Lactoperoxidase is an enzyme naturally present in fresh raw milk. The secret of Cleopatra's smooth skin has historically been attributed to milk! This enzyme has anti-microbial and antioxidant properties which have been very helpful in eliminating acne-causing bacteria. These same anti-bacterial properties act as a natural preservative to the cream itself.

Products which contain this ingredient: MOISTURIZING WASH, CREAM
settings.text3:
Lavandin Grosso is a type of lavender which contains high camphor properties compared to regular lavender, which has none. It can enhance blood circulation and cell regeneration and has antiseptic properties that helps to speed the healing of cuts and acne.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, BAMBOO REFINING POLISH, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text4:
Lecithin is a natural compound used as an emulsifier for softening and smoothing, and keeps skin intensely hydrated, especially for mature, dry, or overworked skin. A major source of lecithin is soybean oil. It also helps carry nutritional ingredients to the cells to penetrate the skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text5:
Lemons are a well-known natural astringent rich in vitamin C and citric acid (a natural AHA), which can not only help brighten and lighten your skin when used over time, it can also help treat your blackheads. Vitamin C is a known antioxidant, which means it can neutralize free radicals and boost collagen production.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK, DEEP ENZYME CLEANSE, HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL, CITRUS CUCUMBER TONER
settings.title6:
Lentinus Edodes Extract

Shiitake Mushroom
settings.text6: See: Shiitake Mushroom
settings.text7:
Licorice extract contains liquiritin, an active compound that helps to remove existing melanin to brighten the skin and fade melasma and age spots.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text8:
The antibiotic properties of limes can help reduce bacterial growth and can help unclog and tighten pores and clear up complexion.

Products which contain this ingredient: HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL
settings.text9:
Lupinus Albus is a mediterranean flower serves as a multi-benefit firming active by stimulating synthesis of a high-quality collagen in the skin. and it effectively increases skin elasticity.

Products which contain this ingredient: BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL

settings.text1:
Mandarin essential oil is very mild and is useful in helping to reduce acne, brighten the skin, diminish the appearance of scars and age spots and minimize stress and wrinkles.

Products which contain this ingredient: MANDARIN MELT CLEANSING BALM
settings.text2:
Mango contains certain naturally occurring antioxidants and vitamins that can act as a UV protector to the skin and excellent hydrator.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK
settings.text3:
Manuka Honey Bees in New Zealand and Australia produce Manuka honey after pollinating native plants including tea trees. Dry and acne prone skin benefit greatly from the anti-bacterial and hydradting powers of this super honey.

Products which contain this ingredient: MANDARIN MELT CLEANSING BALM
settings.text4:
Marshmallow is packed with vitamins, antioxidants and anti-inflammatory properties, When applied to the skin, marshmallow root provides instant hydration and also continuously works to improve the skin’s ability to retain moisture.

Products which contain this ingredient: RADIANT DETOX MINERAL MASK
settings.text5:
Marula Oil is a naturally occurring oil from the Marula tree in Africa. It contains beneficial omega 6 and omega 3 fatty acids which are key to normal and healthy skin function. Dermatologist recommeded for dry or irritated skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: NOURISHING OIL
settings.text6: See : Green Tea
settings.text7:
Meadowsweet extract is from a perennial herb Spiraea ulmaria. It has delicate creamy-white flowers in a cluster with a sweet smell. It works to soothe inflamed skin or acne from its salicylic acid and tannin content. This improves sun damage, and brown skin patches known as melasma.

Products which contain this ingredient: MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text8:
Mica or Mica powder is a naturally occurring mineral dust often used in makeup and skincare. Mica can be used to give cosmetics an illuminating glow or mineral coloring agent.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK, MARINE PEARL CREAM, COLOR, SHIMMER
settings.title9:
Mineral Salts / Dead Sea Salt

Maris Sal
settings.text9:
Maris Sal is the salt from The Dead Sea, the largest natural spa with mineral rich waters. It is rich in magnesium, sodium, potassium and other minerals. It effectively reduces wrinkles, inflammation and improves the skin barrier's function and enhances skin hydration.

Products which contain this ingredient: MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text10:
The skin needs certain minerals for optimal function. These include: aiding in cell renewal, regulate tissue growth and encouraging wound healing but minerals do so much more. The minerals we use are derived from leafy green plants. These naturally based elements are more similar to the compounds we carry in our own bodies and they are more easily recognized and used by the skin than foreign, synthetic ingredients.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, DEEP ENZYME CLEANSE, CITRUS CUCUMBER TONER, MARINE PEARL CREAM, MINERAL TINT SPF 31
settings.text11:
Moringa oil comes from the Moringa tree has several anti-aging benefits from reducing fine lines to offering healing properties for damaged skin cells. It serves as a support booster for our skin barrier. Moringa oil helps skin hydration, fights acne, and soothes inflammation.

Products which contain this ingredient: NOURISHING OIL
settings.text12:
MSM is found in all living organisms and basically holds together the building blocks of all tissues. It is an organic sulfur found in fruits, vegetables, grains, and milk and plays a major part in the body’s ability to produce collagen both collagen and keratin, where it can help to keep the skin smooth and youthful. MSM forms up to 90% of the human body when combined with water and salt and reduces pain, inflammation, and allergic reactions. It works most effectively with plenty of good Vitamin C, making it an excellent approach to anti-aging and a firmer complexion.

Products which contain this ingredient: PLUMPING SERUM, BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, CITRUS CUCUMBER TONER
settings.text13:
Murillo Bark (Quillaja) is a super cleansing plant extract from the Chilean soap bark tree which has properties of cleansing and water-binding for a smooth and moisturizing face wash experience.

Products which contain this ingredient: MOISTURIZING WASH, BAMBOO REFINING POLISH

settings.title1:
Neroli Oil / Orange Blossom Oil

Citrus Aurantium Amara Flower Oil
settings.text1:
Neroli Essential Oil is steam-distilled from the small, white, waxy flowers of the bitter orange tree. Neroli combats free radicals and helps maintain the right oil balance in the skin. Neroli Oil’s powerful skin-reviving properties aid in radiant healthy skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL
settings.text2:
Niacinamide is an essential water-soluable vitaminis a skin brightener that works to keep skineven toned and smooth.They help restore cellular energy of the skin's cells and repair damaged DNA. It reduces effects of the sun’s UV rays, fighting off external and internal stressors to prevent premature aging and also helps prevent the transfer of pigment within the skinfor a brighter more even skintone.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST, RADIANT DETOX MINERAL MASK
settings.text3: See: Niacinamide
settings.text4:
Noni Fruit comes from the Morinda citrifolia evergreen tree. Its primary benefit for skin is it's rich quantity of antioxidants to sooth angry skin while hydrating.

Products which contain this ingredient: MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text5:
Non-nano zinc oxide's ability to provide broad spectrum protection against UVA and UVB rays is unparalleled. By reflecting and scattering UV radiation, it prevents these harmful rays from penetrating the skin, offering reliable and long-lasting sun protection.

Products which contain this ingredient: MINERAL TINT SPF 31
settings.text6:
Nutmeg's natural anti-inflammatory quality helps to reduce redness and pigmentation, providing a more even complexion. Nutmeg is traditionally used in Ayurvedic medicine in face masks to improve the appearance of acne scars.

Products which contain this ingredient: PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK

settings.text1:
Oat kernel extract acts as natural skin cleanser, removes dirt and oil from the skin, diminishes the pores, effective fights dull skin, lightens and improves tone and smooths texture of skin. Oat kernel extract moisturizes, protects, exfoliates, and cleanses your skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text2:
Olive Oil contains the beneficial fat-soluble vitamins A, D, E, and K, including antioxidants which can prevent premature aging. Also, some research suggests that putting olive oil on the skin after sun exposure may fight off cancer-causing cells. A popular natural moisturizer that is often used to soften both skin and hair, olive oil has been used to treat bacterial infections of the skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK, BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST, HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL, NOURISHING OIL
settings.text3:
Our Squalane is NOT shark-liver derived but extracted from olives. Its a powerful moisturizer that helps to hydrate and nourish the skin. It penetrates deep into the skin to provide long-lasting hydration, leaving it soft and supple. It has antioxidant properties that help to protect the skin against free radical damage and premature aging.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text4:
Oliwax is a multipurpose emulsifying and stabilizing lipid derived from ultra refined pure olive oil. It is highly emollient and moisturizing

Products which contain this ingredient: MANDARIN MELT CLEANSING BALM
settings.title5:
Orange Essential Oil

Citrus Sinensis, Orange Peel Oil, Sweet Orange
settings.text5:
is extracted from the rind of the sweet orange, Citrus sinensis. Orange essential oil has a variety of uses. These are said to include applications to: lift your mood or reduce stress, treat skin conditions such as acne and reduce pain or inflammation.

Products which contain this ingredient: PLUMPING SERUM, DEEP ENZYME CLEANSE, MOISTURIZING WASH, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK, BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST, HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL

settings.text1:
When panthenol hits the skin, it becomes vitamin B5, which is known for its moisturizing properties. As a humectant, panthenol pulls up moisture from the deeper layers of the skin so it looks more firm and plump. It also acts as an emollient meaning it softens and soothes the skin. Because it also helps your skin retain water, it stays soft and moisturized longer.

Products which contain this ingredient: CLARIFYING SERUM, RADIANT DETOX MINERAL MASK
settings.text2:
The papain found in papaya is attributed with soothing skin irritations and its anti-inflammatory properties make it an ideal ingredient for acne and blemish-prone skin. Its natural and effective exfoliating properties brighten the skin by removing dead skin cells and flaky patches on the top layer of your skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text3:
Papaya fruit extract is rich in antioxidants, including lycopene, which can help fight free radical damage. Papaya is rich in exfolliating enzymes, beta-carotene, vitamins, and phytochemicals that can help minimize scars and uneven skin pigmentation. These ingredients offer skin-lightening effects that are beneficial in removing blemishes and discoloration.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK
settings.text4:
Pentylene Glycol is a synthetic humectant also used as a solvent and preservative. It is both water and oil-soluble and can have moisture-binding and antimicrobial properties.

Products which contain this ingredient: MOISTURIZING WASH, BAMBOO REFINING POLISH, BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST
settings.text5: Peppermint essential oil is used to soothe inflammation, irritation and itchiness on skin while cleansing and unclogging pores.
settings.text6:
Phenoxyethanol is a synthetic preservative and antimicrobial. Although this product is synthetic, this chemical occurs naturally in green tea. We use less than 1% of this in our SERUM. This preservative is approved by CredoBeauty.com.

Products which contain this ingredient: PLUMPING SERUM, BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL, BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK
settings.text7:
Vitamin K aids factors that promote collagen synthesis in the body Vitamin K also improves cardio-vascular health which ensures smooth supply of oxygenated blood to your skin to help brighten dark under eye circles.

Products which contain this ingredient: BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL
settings.text8:
Phytosphingosine, like a ceremide, is a type of lipid fat that naturally occurs in skin cells to support your skin's barrier function.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM
settings.text9: See: Bromelain
settings.text10:
Full of vitamin C, pink grapefruit peel oil is well known for its ability to restore brightness and vibrance back to skin. It has antioxidants like vitamin C and vitamin A, it protects the skin from environmental stressors that harm the skin. Vitamin A has the ability to tighten, firm, and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Pink grapefruit peel oil contains lycopene, which is a natural exfoliant.

Products which contain this ingredient: HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL, MARINE PEARL CREAM, PLUMPING SERUM
settings.text11:
Polyglyceryl-6 oleate is a vegetable derivate to help moisturize the skin and help keep the oil and water ingredients emulsified.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST
settings.text12:
Polysorbate 20 belongs to a group of cleansing agents most often derived from lauric acid, which is a medium-chain triglyceride (a type of fatty acid) found in coconuts. Acts as an emulsifier.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM
settings.text13:
Polysorbate 60 is an emulsifier made from the sugar ingredient sorbitol. It helps to remove dirt, impurities, and excess oil from the skin, leaving it clean and refreshed. This ingredient helps to lock in moisture, preventing dryness and promoting a hydrated complexion.

Products which contain this ingredient: MINERAL TINT SPF 31
settings.text14:
Pomegranate seeds contain an oil rich in polyphenols and bioflavonoids such as anthocyains and ellagic acid, powerful antioxidants that fight the skin's ageing process and detox the skin. These antioxidants help fade the appearance of age spots, blemishes, fine lines and wrinkles. They also help regenerate skin from sun damage and make it look firmer, more radiant and youthful. It also contains enzymes that break down the dead skin cells and is a gentle option over various AHA chemical exfoliants.

Products which contain this ingredient: MOISTURIZING WASH
settings.title15:
Pomelo Peel Oil

Citrus Maxima, Citrus Grandis, Chinese Grapefruit
settings.text15:
Ancestor of the grapefruit, also known as Chinese grapefruit, pomelo peel oil (like pineapple) contains bromelain, an enzyme which speeds up the digestion of proteins and thus helps cleanse the skin by removing the older, outer skin layers. Rich in antioxidants that fight free radicals, oil extracted from the peel of the pomelo is exceptionally nourishing and protective, as it is high in flavonoids, and rich in vitamin C.

Products which contain this ingredient: MOISTURIZING WASH, CITRUS CUCUMBER TONER
settings.text16:
Potassium Sorbate is a mild preservative that can be derived naturally and is usually used in conjuction with another preservative due to its gentle strength. It's been found to be safe in amounts up to 10% and our formula uses less than 1%. It is loaded with antifungal and antibacterial properties to ensure your skincare and cosmetic products remain hygienic and stable for your daily routine. It prevents the growth of bacteria, yeast, and mold.

Products which contain this ingredient: CITRUS CUCUMBER TONER, PLUMPING SERUM
settings.text17:
Pullulan is a natural fibrous polymer produced by a type of black yeast known as Aureobasidium pullulans. It contains complex sugars known as polysaccharides, which makes it a fantastic moisture retaining hydrator for plump skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text18:
Pumpkin is made up of alpha hydroxy acids (similar to glycolic acid and lactic acid), which are fruit acids that slough dead skin cells, increase cell turnover and keep the skin glowing. Pumpkin also boosts collagen production which keeps skin from looking cracked and scaly.

Products which contain this ingredient: PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text19:
Purslane is derived from the succulent Portulaca oleracea and provides powerful antioxidant benefits that stimulate collagen and cell repair which result in diminishing the appearance of wrinkles and scarring.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM

settings.text1:
The vitamin C and antioxidants in raspberry can reduce the signs of aging such as black spots or wrinkles. The antioxidants in raspberries can keep the skin healthy and rejuvenate it. Raspberries can help reduce redness on sensitive skin and the anthocyanin content in raspberries can help the skin look brighter and and more youthful.

Products which contain this ingredient: COLOR
settings.text2:
Red Sea Algae Extract is a seaweed rich in nutrients including beta carotene and potent antioxidants. Loaded with natural amino acids and peptides and hydrating plant extracts for an emollient cleansing experience resulting in glowing clean skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAMBOO REFINING POLISH, BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST, MARINE PEARL CREAM, CITRUS CUCUMBER TONER, MOISTURIZING WASH
settings.text3:
Rose petals, which are anti-bacterial in nature and have astringent properties, are considered excellent for hydrating the skin and making it soft. the antioxidants in roses help to strengthen skin cells, which in turn, can help regenerate skin tissues.

Products which contain this ingredient: RADIANT DETOX MINERAL MASK
settings.text4:
Because it contains high concentrations of vitamin A, B vitamins, and vitamin E, rosehip oil is known for its exceptional regenerative and healing properties. Rosehip oil contains carotenoids, which help keep your skin fresh and healthy by creating new skin cells. Rosehip oil also helps trap moisture in your skin and protect your skin against damage.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAMBOO REFINING POLISH, NOURISHING OIL

settings.text1:
Saccharide Isomerate a plant-derived carbohydrate that mimics the composition of sugars naturally found in the skin's stratum corneum (outermost layer). This gives skin a natural ability to hold onto moisture for longer and therefore helps smooth and plump skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST
settings.text2:
Saccharomyces has the ability to stimulate mitochondrial metabolism and a high beta-glucan content. This helps to stimulate colllagen production to increase skin smoothness and firmness and strengthen skin barrier.

Products which contain this ingredient: CITRUS CUCUMBER TONER
settings.text3:
Safflower oil from the safflower plant is rich in linoleic acid a powerful nutrient which promotes suppleness, and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles over time. The dense concentration of nutrients inherent in safflower oil naturally balances your skin’s oils.

Products which contain this ingredient: MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text4:
Salicylic Acid is a type of beta hydroxy acid (BHA) that penetrates the pores to dissolve excess oil and dead skin cells. Clinical studies have demonstrated its ability to brighten, hydrate, reduce the appearance of fine lines, and improve the skin barrier within 3-4 weeks.

Aspen bark and willow bark are natural sources of salicylic acid. These botanical extracts contain a milder form of salicylic acid, making them suitable for more sensitive skin types.

Products which contain this ingredient: CLARIFYING SERUM (Aspen Bark), PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK (Aspen Bark)
settings.text5:
Sclerotium gum is used in cosmetics to thicken and stabilise formulas. It also functions as a skin conditioning agent. Sclerotium gum is also used as a natural alternative to synthetic gelling agents like carbomers.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text6:
Rich in antioxidants, sea buckthorn oil offers strong protection against stressors that hasten the signs of aging. It's brimming with polyphenols, flavonoids, micronutrients, and vitamins A, C, and E, which all work hard to neutralize the threat of external aggressors. These antioxidants work to smooth the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, plump the skin, and even out tone and texture.

Products which contain this ingredient: MANDARIN MELT CLEANSING BALM
settings.text7:
Shea Butter is derived from the seed of the shea tree. Seeds are split into two fractions, one having the moisture properties and one having the healing properties. The healing fraction of Shea butter is immense and has important nutrients vitamins and phytonutrients and is used to treat wrinkles, eczema, sunburn to name a few. There are large amounts of natural Vitamin A and Vitamin E found in Shea butter.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL, HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL, MINERAL TINT SPF 31
settings.text8:
Shea Nut oil is an excellent emollient that is very high in oleic fatty acids, making it particularly beneficial for those with dry, irritated, or mature skin types. Its considered non-comedeogenic, is rich in vitamin E and absorbs quickly and is effective for both face and body.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK
settings.title9:
Shiitake Mushroom

Lentinus Edodes Extract
settings.text9:
Shiitake Mushroom is a rich source of kojic acid, is used to brighten the skin, fade sunspots and acne scars. Shiitake's anti-inflammatory properties help improve vitality and encourage faster skin renewal increasing skin elasticity. loaded with skin-saving vitamins: "Mushrooms are rich in B complex vitamins, which can do everything from calm inflammation, soothe eczema and lighten pigmentation of the skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: PLUMPING SERUM
settings.text10: See: Jojoba Oil
settings.text11:
Sodium Benzoate is found naturally in cranberries, prunes, plums, cinnamon, ripe cloves, and apples is an anticorrosive and a preservative. It is excellent at inhibiting the growth of fungus, yeast and bacteria. It can also have a sunscreen effect, providing UVB protection with antioxidant activity.

Products which contain this ingredient: CLARIFYING SERUM, HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL, MARINE PEARL CREAM, MOISTURIZING WASH, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK
settings.text12:
Sodium citrate in skin care is used primarily to control the pH level and preserve a formula from microorganisms and inadvertent contamination during use.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST
settings.text13:
Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate is derived from natural sources such as coconut oil, palm kernel oil, and fermented sugar and protects the skin from drying and retains the moisture content.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAMBOO REFINING POLISH, BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST, MOISTURIZING WASH
settings.text14:
Sodium Hyaluronate is a smaller molecule realtive of HA which is a naturally occurring sugar that is found in the body. As a humectant, its main purpose is to draw in moisture (up to 1000X its own weight) helps to restore the skin's moisture, promoting a more revitalized and youthful complexion. Sodium Hyaluronate smoothes the appearance of wrinkles and improves the skin's texture.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST, MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text15:
Sodium lauroyl lactylate contains the fatty acid known as lauric acid. This component helps to lubricate skin and strengthen the skin barrier, which helps skin to retain water. This helps products better moisturize skin while providing a silky feeling. Additionally, lauric acid is effective for acne-prone skin due to its antimicrobial properties. It is able to penetrate pores without clogging them. In addition, due to SLL being a natural surfactant, it provides a light foam to products and helps remove dirt and oil from the skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM
settings.text16:
Sodium PCA is the sodium salt of pyroglutamic acid also known as PCA and is a naturally occurring component of human skin and a part of the "natural moisturizing factors" that maintain a healthy epidermis. Sodium PCA (like hyaluronic acid) increases the water content of the top layer of the skin by drawing moisture from the air.

Products which contain this ingredient: MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text17:
A lipopeptide-based biosurfactant produced by the process of fermentation. Mixed with water, the rich foamy lather melts away dirt, oil and make-up while conditioning and protecting the newly cleansed skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUE TANSY HYDRATING FACE MIST
settings.text18:
Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer is an emulsifier that is 100% naturally derived from sugar, corn, and olive oil. It is used to disperse the oils in the water. It is petrochemical free and dioxane free.

Products which contain this ingredient: MOISTURIZING WASH
settings.text19:
Sorbitan Olivate is a mixture of sodium hydroxide salts, obtained from virgin olive oil, rich in fatty acids (oleic, palmitic, linoleic and stearic). which acts as anti-aging, nourishing and anti-oxidant for the skin.

Products which contain this ingredient: MARINE PEARL CREAM
settings.text20:
Spearmint leaves have powerful antibacterial and antifungal qualities that help to reduce inflammation and cleanse pores. Spearmint contains the antioxidant called ‘rosmarinic acid’, which helps to improve blood circulation while also hydrating the skin. Furthermore, it protects the skin from free radical damage to help promote a firmer complexion.

Products which contain this ingredient:
settings.text21:
Spring water or often referred to as ‘thermal water’ contains an abundance of healing properties and vitamins like magnesium, potassium, calcium. Alongside its nutrient rich health benefits, water derived straight from thermal springs is also more alkaline than tap water and is considered to be perfectly neutral pH wise.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL, MOISTURIZING WASH, MINERAL TINT SPF 31
settings.text22:
St Johns Wort has a natural ability to calm skinredness and irritaion Topical use has been used to promote faster skin recovery and has been proven to increase skin elasticity and hydration, reduce inflammation, aiding a smooth and young looking complexion.

Products which contain this ingredient: BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL
settings.text23:
Sunflower seed oil has emollient properties that help the skin retain its moisture. and and helpsto trap moisture inside skin cells, keeping skin hydrated for a longer period. It is extremely high in vitamin E – an antioxidant that helps protect skin cells from harmful UV rays from the sun and other environmental stressors.In addition to vitamin E, sunflower oil is also rich in vitamins A, C, and D, making it effective in the treatment of acne. Sunflower seed oil contains vitamins and fatty acids that act as antioxidants to regenerate glowing new skin cells.

Products which contain this ingredient: BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL, BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK, MANDARIN MELT CLEANSING BALM, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK

settings.text1:
Tamanu oil is readily absorbed into the skin; it soothes the skin and protects it from environmental damage. The oil is antibacterial and antimicrobial. So traditionally also it was used to apply on wounds to make them heal faster. It is also a powerful antioxidant, which is good dual ways; for skin, it fights with free radicals and saves it from further damage, and secondly, it stabilizes preparations by protecting it from reactive oxygen species. It is also believed to protect from damaging UV rays. Calophyllic acid is as one of the constituents, believed in providing regeneration properties to skin tissues.

Products which contain this ingredient: NOURISHING OIL
settings.text2:
Tamarind has been used in skincare rituals for years due to its brightening properties. This fruit is indigenous to Madagascar, Africa. Tamarind is a natural humectant, aiding in absorbing moisture from the environment and locking it into our skin cells. The antioxidants in Tamarind reduce blemishes, evens skin tone, and lessen the effects of hyperpigmentation.

Products which contain this ingredient: CITRUS CUCUMBER TONER
settings.text3:
Tangerine Essential Oil has a high antioxidant profile, which makes it useful for promoting smoother, more toned skin. Its antifungal and antiseptic properties help to prevent skin infections and is said to visibly reduces the appearance of stretch marks and scars.

Products which contain this ingredient: PLUMPING SERUM, HYDRATING CREAMY BODY OIL

settings.text1:
Vanilla is rich in antioxidants which prevent and reverse skin damage caused by free radicals . It helps to slow down signs of ageing like fine lines, wrinkles and age spots.

Products which contain this ingredient: MANDARIN MELT CLEANSING BALM
settings.text2: See: Glycerin
settings.text3:
This superstar antioxidant neutralizes the free radicals allowing the skin to repair and rebuild. Loaded with pro collagen and pro elastin properties improve skin tone and firmness, helps reduce and prevent age spots and pigmentation issues. It stimulates the skin’s structural proteins of collagen which softens fine lines and wrinkles and helps prevent new ones from forming. It is an anti-inflammatory and helps treat acne and reduce the redness associated with it. Vitamin C diminishes the harm of sun rays to help fight daily UV rays.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, PLUMPING SERUM
settings.title4:
Vitamin C Ester

Ascorbyl Palmitate
settings.text4:
Vitamin C Ester is less acidic than regular vitamin C which is water soluble and can’t penetrate past your skins natural water barriers. C Ester is fused with a fat-soluble carrier oil making the absorption highly effective. At the same time, free radicals cause signs of aging. They lead to dark spots on the skin and can damage the collagen and this leads to wrinkles, dark marks, and pigmentation problems. By using Vitamin C Ester topically, you can reduce the amount of aging you will see on your skin. The antioxidants will fight against the free radicals that will attack the damaged cells as they repair and grow again. You’ll also find it reduces redness and promotes new tissue growth as it helps build collagen. Vitamin C Ester increases the formation of elastin, which thickens, protects, and heals the skin cells. The thickening effect helps retain moisture, increases the skin circulation, and plumps up the skin surface. This wonder vitamin brings back a radiance and a glow to rough, blotchy skin!

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, RADIANT DETOX MINERAL MASK
settings.text5:
Tocotrienols is a very potent form of Vitamin E, effective in repairing damaged skin. Your body doesn't make Vitamin E, so it needs to be added topically or in your diet. It is one of the most important antioxidants found in food and used by your body for its healing effects. These effects are enhanced when combined with Vitamin C and ALA. Damage from the Sun's harmful UV rays is one of the biggest enemies to the skin (leading to lines, wrinkles and sagging skin) and an important function of Vitamin E applied topically is to protect it from that damage.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, MARINE PEARL CREAM, MINERAL TINT SPF 31, PUMPKIN ENZYME MASK, PLUMPING SERUM, BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK, COLOR, SHIMMER
settings.text6:
Vitellaria Seed oil possesses the amazing quality of sealing in moisture, to intensely hydrate the skin and restore vivacity to lacklustre skin tissues. with potent antioxidants, Vitellaria regenerates new healthy skin cells and diminishes signs of premature ageing, wrinkles and fine lines.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK, BOTANICAL LIFT EYE GEL, MINERAL TINT SPF 31

settings.text1:
White tea extract has natural protective, repairing, and soothing abilities, restoring and boosting the skin’s immunity and supporting a healthier outer barrier. A damaged skin barrier can allow outside agents to enter the skin and cause cells damage. By strengthening the lipid barrier, white tea extract enables the skin to fight off harmful external elements and maintain a healthy, supple, and glowing complexion.

Products which contain this ingredient: BLUEBERRY BOOST MASK
settings.text2:
Geranium Oil is a highly effective anti-ageing ingredient to tone and protect your skin, tightening your epidermis to reduce the appearance of fine lines, it also has potent cellular regeneration properties. Its antibacterial properties can purify and soothe your skin.The leaves, stems, and roots are high in tannins and offer amazing natural astringent properties. Which can cause the skin to contract resulting in more toned, firm skin, and the diminished appearance of wrinkles.

Products which contain this ingredient: CREAM, BAMBOO REFINING POLISH, BAKUCHIOL WONDER SERUM
settings.title3:
Witch Hazel

Hamamelis Virginiana Water
settings.text3:
Witch hazel is a plant with powerful medicinal properties. As noted by the School of Life Sciences, Kingston University, London, it contains antioxidants that are said to help prevent widespread inflammation and neutralize free radicals, which are disease-causing compounds that can build up in your body. Therefore, witch hazel could be useful in the treatment of inflammatory-related issues, such as acne, eczema or psoriasis.

Products which contain this ingredient: CLARIFYING SERUM, CITRUS CUCUMBER TONER, PLUMPING SERUM

settings.text1:
Xanthan gum is included in many foods and personal care products because of its stabilizing and thickening properties. It's created when corn sugar is fermented by a type of bacteria called Xanthomonas campestris. When xanthan gum powder is added to a liquid, it quickly disperses and creates a viscous and stable solution. It was discovered by scientists in 1963. Since then, it has been well researched with the FDA approving it as a safe food additive.

It also an excellent humectant to moisturuize and hydrate the skin, diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and restore a healthy glow.
